title: Mafia 3 News
body:
I know you’re waiting for it.

So, here’s the couple of news.

1) It doesn’t have Denuvo. It has Arxan, the protection similar to GTA5 and some other games. It’s crackable, so just wait until RELOADED will dot their job.
2) It’s pretty compressible. I already checked the game resources and initial analysis is in progress. Selective download is also on it’s way.
